title: New Nami Skin Plez RIOT!
body: Hi am new to League of Legends and really enjoy the game. BUT my lord the Nami Skins are well ... Poop! the only nice one would be the SKT one but i can not buy :( plez RIOT Gods notice me. Make Very Nice Nami Skin Plez . {{champion:267}}  even her icon looks vintage. she deserves better. P.s how does one swim on grass?..... i not know. :(
